isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL 9, 10, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - INSTALL - REVERSE IDLER GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Lubricate all parts with new oil that is used in the transmission. Refer to GROUP 10-LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
Install the needle bearing assembly inside the lower reverse idler gear (Figure 301).
Install the inner race inside the needle bearing assembly (Figure 301).
Install a spacer washer on each side of the reverse idler gear ( Figure 301).
Put the lower reverse idler gear in position in the bottom of the case.
From the auxiliary cover side of the transmission case, install the shaft through the reverse idler gear assembly.

Install the nut and the washer that fastens the lower reverse idler gear assembly in the case. Hold the end of the shaft with a screwdriver. Tighten the nut to 102 to 136 Nm (75 to 100 ft-lbs.) (Figure 302).
